name: Tabatoo
tag_list: mobile-advertising, mobile, mobile-search, ios, android, mobile-apps, sidebar, side-bar
overview:
The Tabatoo bar creates new real estate on mobile apps that is used for monetization and engagement. Unlike other monetization options, it is non-intrusive and contributes to the experience and satisfaction from the app. It simply works!

The Tabatoo bar encapsulates an extra real estate on the app where a search bar, social connectors and ads are being placed. The bar is revealed by the user at its own will, adding to the engagement and readiness to be presented with sponsored content. The User is presented with the Tabatoo handle or with a button, customized to perfectly fit the app and for highest conversion.

Tabatoo takes care of all the rest: an ecosystem of content and revenues.
